data.subject: Why`d You Leave Me On Christmas (Album Ver.)
data.lyric:
See I bought you diamonds
 And a brother stopped lyin'
 I bought you Donna
 Ralph Lauren and Prada

data.subject: Jingle Bells (Album Ver.)
data.lyric:
jingle bells,jingle bells
 jingle all the way oh what fun it is to ride on a one horse open sleigh
